official_title: A Study of the ApricityCare Program for Early Detection and Management of Treatment-related Adverse Events in Patients With Metastatic Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 18 years of age or older
* Confirmed diagnosis of metastatic cancer (for the Run-in Phase only: prostate, kidney, and/or bladder cancer will be enrolled)
* Planned to receive systemic anti-cancer therapy
* Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document
* Ability to speak, read, and understand one of the following languages: English, Spanish, Mandarin Chinese
* Ownership of a smartphone and willingness to use it as outlined by the protocol and described in the ICF
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: - Have any medical, psychological, or social condition that, in the opinion of the investigator would preclude participation in this study (pregnancy is not exclusionary and pregnant women will be permitted to enroll in the study).
